text: I have the requirement that it should be possible to issue a search for documents from every Java service. For this purpose, I'd like to introduce a service interface, e.g. DocumentSearcher, with a method that returns a list of hits.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org

Created attachment 21959
Search API and Lucene-based implementation

This patch contains the search API (located in the core), a Lucene-based implementation (located in the lucene module) and a meta-data-based link manager that makes use of the meta data indexing.
